original_title: Svarta gengið - saga um ást, dauða, bónda og fé
overview: Bjössi, a farmer, lives in the middle of nowhere with his flock of black sheep, which are his closest friends and family. One day he receives the news that he has to cull his flock because of illness. When the day of reckoning comes, it turns out to be the hardest day he has ever encountered.
title: Black Sheep - The Last Symphony for a Sheep
